contentList.content: One of the seven forces of reality, the Speed Force has chosen you as a conduit, imparting upon you powers of reality in motion.
Your connection to the speed force gives you an additional 3m of movement whenever you have one or more lightning charges.
You gain your proficiency bonus to initiative, and gain one lightning charge at the beginning of combat.
Many people are fast - you're faster.
Your increased speed gives you an edge in combat. Gain an additional bonus action each turn.
Merging with the Speed Force grants you protection from lightning damage and it's effects.
Your speed increases further as you learn more about the Speed Force, granting you an additional action each turn.
The Speed Force has chosen you as the ultimate conduit for its power, making your mastery of lightning spells second to none.
